episodes.synopsis: Crew members of Apache attack helicopters reveal details of their dangerous jobs as they discuss what it is like to hunt the Taliban from the air.
episodes.title: Choppers

episodes.synopsis: The Royal Scots Dragoon Guards go "combat caravanning" in the dangerous Afghan countryside on the Warthog, the British Army's latest armored vehicle.
episodes.title: War Wagons

episodes.synopsis: Infantry soldiers fighting in Helmand Province are both energized and overwhelmed by the constant threat of death and injury as they face the enemy.
episodes.title: Squaddies

video.title: Fighting on the Frontline
video.synopsis: Meet the young troops of Britain's armed forces as they reveal the preparations, dangers and stress involved in defeating modern-day insurgents.
